mil3.1.16:0.3: Production of One Result from Various Mental States Question
mil3.1.16:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, do these mental states, though being diverse, produce the one result?”
mil3.1.16:1.3: “Yes, your majesty, these mental states, though being diverse, do produce the one result; they kill the defilements.”
mil3.1.16:2.1: “How is it, venerable sir, these mental states, though being diverse, produce the one result, and kill the defilements?
mil3.1.16:2.3: “Just as, your majesty, an army is diverse, and its elephants, horses, chariots, and foot-soldiers produce the one result; they conquer an opposing army in battle,
mil3.1.16:2.4: in the same way, your majesty, these mental states, though being diverse, produce the one result; they kill the defilements.”
